name: ARReferenceImage
desc: A 2D image that you want ARKit to detect in the physical environment.

items.name: class func referenceImages(inGroupNamed: String, bundle: Bundle?) -> Set<ARReferenceImage>?
items.desc: Loads all reference images in the specified AR Resource Group in your Xcode project's asset catalog.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: A descriptive name for the image.

items.name: var physicalSize: CGSize
items.desc: The real-world dimensions, in meters, of the image.

items.name: var resourceGroupName: String?
items.desc: The AR resource group name for this image.

items.name: init(CGImage, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, physicalWidth: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a new reference image from a Core Graphics image object.

items.name: init(CVPixelBuffer, orientation: CGImagePropertyOrientation, physicalWidth: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a new reference image from a Core Video pixel buffer.

items.name: func validate(completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Determines whether the reference image is valid.
